caption: Table 1: (Real-world performance) V-GPS consistently improves the success rates of Octo across the board, achieving an 82.8% improvement on average. This demonstrates that using our value function to re-rank the actions can enhance the generalist policy.
description: Table 1 shows the success rates of the Octo-small-1.5 policy and the V-GPS method on six real-world robotic manipulation tasks, demonstrating a substantial performance improvement with V-GPS.
section: 6.2 What Kind of Failure Modes of the Generalist Policy Does V-GPS Address?

caption: Table 2: (SIMPLER [11] performance) V-GPS improves the success rates of all five generalist policies across multiple embodiments using the same single value function.
description: Table 2 presents the average success rates of five different generalist robot policies across multiple robot embodiments on twelve tasks within the SIMPLER simulated environment, comparing performance with and without V-GPS.

section: E Additional Comparisons to Policy Fine-Tuning Approaches
